title: Whirlpool (Baxtorian Falls)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Whirlpool is an object at the end of a long pier in the lake above Baxtorian Falls. Right-clicking on it gives the option to "Dive in". Jumping into it transports a player past the falls and to the shore on the east side of the lake at the bottom of the falls (just above the tourist centre), but the player will take about 6 hitpoints of damage in the process. After doing the Pyre ship part of Barbarian Training, the player will instead be transported to the Ancient Cavern. If a player has a pet or a familiar out, they will not be able to enter until the familiar has been dismissed or the pet has been picked up.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Whirlpool (Baxtorian Falls)
This article is about the entrance to the Ancient Cavern. For other uses, see Whirlpool.
Whirlpool
Released3 July 2007 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationBaxtorian Falls (Kandarin)
OptionsDive in
ExamineCrazy-looking whirlpool.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID25274,25275
A player jumping into the whirlpool.

The Whirlpool is an object at the end of a long pier in the lake above Baxtorian Falls. Right-clicking on it gives the option to "Dive in". Jumping into it transports a player past the falls and to the shore on the east side of the lake at the bottom of the falls (just above the tourist centre), but the player will take about 6 hitpoints of damage in the process. After doing the Pyre ship part of Barbarian Training, the player will instead be transported to the Ancient Cavern. If a player has a pet or a familiar out, they will not be able to enter until the familiar has been dismissed or the pet has been picked up.

The easiest way to reach Baxtorian falls is by teleporting to the Barbarian Assault Minigame by using a Games necklace.

Barbarian Fishing can be done in the nearby fishing spots. To fish you will need a heavy rod and any type of fishing bait. The heavy rod can be obtained by searching Otto Godblessed's bed.

[[File:Whirlpool jump.png|right|thumb|300px|A player jumping into the whirlpool.]]
The '''Whirlpool''' is an object at the end of a long pier in the lake above [[Baxtorian Falls]]. Right-clicking on it gives the option to "Dive in". Jumping into it transports a player past the falls and to the shore on the east side of the lake at the bottom of the falls (just above the tourist centre), but the player will take about 6 hitpoints of damage in the process. After doing the [[Pyre ship]] part of [[Barbarian Training]], the player will instead be transported to the [[Ancient Cavern]]. If a player has a pet or a familiar out, they will not be able to enter until the familiar has been dismissed or the pet has been picked up.

The easiest way to reach Baxtorian falls is by teleporting to the [[Barbarian Assault]] Minigame by using a [[Games necklace]].

Barbarian [[Fishing]] can be done in the nearby [[fishing spots]]. To fish you will need a [[heavy rod]] and any type of fishing bait. The heavy rod can be obtained by searching [[Otto Godblessed]]'s bed.
